00039         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint16 float2half(glm::uint32 f)
00040         {
00041                 // 10 bits    =>                         EE EEEFFFFF
00042                 // 11 bits    =>                        EEE EEFFFFFF
00043                 // Half bits  =>                   SEEEEEFF FFFFFFFF
00044                 // Float bits => SEEEEEEE EFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
00045 
00046                 // 0x00007c00 => 00000000 00000000 01111100 00000000
00047                 // 0x000003ff => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11111111
00048                 // 0x38000000 => 00111000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00049                 // 0x7f800000 => 01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
00050                 // 0x00008000 => 00000000 00000000 10000000 00000000
00051                 return
00052                         ((f >> 16) & 0x8000) | // sign
00053                         ((((f & 0x7f800000) - 0x38000000) >> 13) & 0x7c00) | // exponential
00054                         ((f >> 13) & 0x03ff); // Mantissa
00055         }
00056 
00057         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 float2packed11(glm::uint32 f)
00058         {
00059                 // 10 bits    =>                         EE EEEFFFFF
00060                 // 11 bits    =>                        EEE EEFFFFFF
00061                 // Half bits  =>                   SEEEEEFF FFFFFFFF
00062                 // Float bits => SEEEEEEE EFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
00063 
00064                 // 0x000007c0 => 00000000 00000000 00000111 11000000
00065                 // 0x00007c00 => 00000000 00000000 01111100 00000000
00066                 // 0x000003ff => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11111111
00067                 // 0x38000000 => 00111000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00068                 // 0x7f800000 => 01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
00069                 // 0x00008000 => 00000000 00000000 10000000 00000000
00070                 return
00071                         ((((f & 0x7f800000) - 0x38000000) >> 17) & 0x07c0) | // exponential
00072                         ((f >> 17) & 0x003f); // Mantissa
00073         }
00074 
00075         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 packed11ToFloat(glm::uint32 p)
00076         {
00077                 // 10 bits    =>                         EE EEEFFFFF
00078                 // 11 bits    =>                        EEE EEFFFFFF
00079                 // Half bits  =>                   SEEEEEFF FFFFFFFF
00080                 // Float bits => SEEEEEEE EFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
00081 
00082                 // 0x000007c0 => 00000000 00000000 00000111 11000000
00083                 // 0x00007c00 => 00000000 00000000 01111100 00000000
00084                 // 0x000003ff => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11111111
00085                 // 0x38000000 => 00111000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00086                 // 0x7f800000 => 01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
00087                 // 0x00008000 => 00000000 00000000 10000000 00000000
00088                 return
00089                         ((((p & 0x07c0) << 17) + 0x38000000) & 0x7f800000) | // exponential
00090                         ((p & 0x003f) << 17); // Mantissa
00091         }
00092 
00093         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 float2packed10(glm::uint32 f)
00094         {
00095                 // 10 bits    =>                         EE EEEFFFFF
00096                 // 11 bits    =>                        EEE EEFFFFFF
00097                 // Half bits  =>                   SEEEEEFF FFFFFFFF
00098                 // Float bits => SEEEEEEE EFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
00099 
00100                 // 0x0000001F => 00000000 00000000 00000000 00011111
00101                 // 0x0000003F => 00000000 00000000 00000000 00111111
00102                 // 0x000003E0 => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11100000
00103                 // 0x000007C0 => 00000000 00000000 00000111 11000000
00104                 // 0x00007C00 => 00000000 00000000 01111100 00000000
00105                 // 0x000003FF => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11111111
00106                 // 0x38000000 => 00111000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00107                 // 0x7f800000 => 01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
00108                 // 0x00008000 => 00000000 00000000 10000000 00000000
00109                 return
00110                         ((((f & 0x7f800000) - 0x38000000) >> 18) & 0x03E0) | // exponential
00111                         ((f >> 18) & 0x001f); // Mantissa
00112         }
00113 
00114         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint32 packed10ToFloat(glm::uint32 p)
00115         {
00116                 // 10 bits    =>                         EE EEEFFFFF
00117                 // 11 bits    =>                        EEE EEFFFFFF
00118                 // Half bits  =>                   SEEEEEFF FFFFFFFF
00119                 // Float bits => SEEEEEEE EFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF FFFFFFFF
00120 
00121                 // 0x0000001F => 00000000 00000000 00000000 00011111
00122                 // 0x0000003F => 00000000 00000000 00000000 00111111
00123                 // 0x000003E0 => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11100000
00124                 // 0x000007C0 => 00000000 00000000 00000111 11000000
00125                 // 0x00007C00 => 00000000 00000000 01111100 00000000
00126                 // 0x000003FF => 00000000 00000000 00000011 11111111
00127                 // 0x38000000 => 00111000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00128                 // 0x7f800000 => 01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000
00129                 // 0x00008000 => 00000000 00000000 10000000 00000000
00130                 return
00131                         ((((p & 0x03E0) << 18) + 0x38000000) & 0x7f800000) | // exponential
00132                         ((p & 0x001f) << 18); // Mantissa
00133         }

00135         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint half2float(glm::uint h)
00136         {
00137                 return ((h & 0x8000) << 16) | ((( h & 0x7c00) + 0x1C000) << 13) | ((h & 0x03FF) << 13);
00138         }

00140         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER glm::uint floatTo11bit(float x)
00141         {
00142                 if(x == 0.0f)
00143                         return 0;
00144                 else if(glm::isnan(x))
00145                         return ~0;
00146                 else if(glm::isinf(x))
00147                         return 0x1f << 6;
00148 
00149 #               if(GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_GCC || GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_CLANG)
00150                         uint Pack = 0;
00151                         memcpy(&Pack, &x, sizeof(Pack));
00152 #               else    
00153                         uint Pack = reinterpret_cast<uint&>(x);
00154 #               endif
00155 
00156                 return float2packed11(Pack);
00157         }

00159         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float packed11bitToFloat(glm::uint x)
00160         {
00161                 if(x == 0)
00162                         return 0.0f;
00163                 else if(x == ((1 << 11) - 1))
00164                         return ~0;//NaN
00165                 else if(x == (0x1f << 6))
00166                         return ~0;//Inf
00167 
00168                 uint Result = packed11ToFloat(x);
00169 
00170 #               if(GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_GCC || GLM_COMPILER & GLM_COMPILER_CLANG)
00171                         float Temp = 0;
00172                         memcpy(&Temp, &Result, sizeof(Temp));
00173                         return Temp;
00174 #               else    
00175                         return reinterpret_cast<float&>(Result);
00176 #               endif
00177         }

00185                 else if(glm::isinf(x))
00186                         return 0x1f << 5;

00189                         uint Pack = 0;
00190                         memcpy(&Pack, &x, sizeof(Pack));
00191 #               else    
00192                         uint Pack = reinterpret_cast<uint&>(x);
00193 #               endif
00194

00199         {

00203                         return ~0;//NaN

00205                         return ~0;//Inf

00211                         memcpy(&Temp, &Result, sizeof(Temp));

00214                         return reinterpret_cast<float&>(Result);

00249         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint8 packUnorm1x8(float v)
00250         {
00251                 return static_cast<uint8>(round(clamp(v, 0.0f, 1.0f) * 255.0f));
00252         }
00253         
00254         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float unpackUnorm1x8(uint8 p)
00255         {
00256                 float Unpack(static_cast<float>(p));
00257                 return Unpack * static_cast<float>(0.0039215686274509803921568627451); // 1 / 255
00258         }

00261         {
00262                 u8vec2 Topack(round(clamp(v, 0.0f, 1.0f) * 255.0f));
00263                 uint16* Packed = reinterpret_cast<uint16*>(&Topack);
00264                 return *Packed;
00265         }

00268         {
00269                 u8vec2* Unpacked = reinterpret_cast<u8vec2*>(const_cast<uint16*>(&p));
00270                 return vec2(*Unpacked) * float(0.0039215686274509803921568627451); // 1 / 255
00271         }

00383         {

00399                 Result.data.z = v.z;
00400                 Result.data.w = v.w;
00401                 return Result.pack;

00436         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint32 packSnorm3x10_1x2(vec4 const & v)
00437         {
00438                 detail::i10i10i10i2 Result;
00439                 Result.data.x = int(round(clamp(v.x,-1.0f, 1.0f) * 511.f));
00440                 Result.data.y = int(round(clamp(v.y,-1.0f, 1.0f) * 511.f));
00441                 Result.data.z = int(round(clamp(v.z,-1.0f, 1.0f) * 511.f));
00442                 Result.data.w = int(round(clamp(v.w,-1.0f, 1.0f) *   1.f));
00443                 return Result.pack;
00444         }
00445 
00446         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vec4 unpackSnorm3x10_1x2(uint32 v)
00447         {
00448                 detail::i10i10i10i2 Unpack;
00449                 Unpack.pack = v;
00450                 vec4 Result;
00451                 Result.x = clamp(float(Unpack.data.x) / 511.f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00452                 Result.y = clamp(float(Unpack.data.y) / 511.f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00453                 Result.z = clamp(float(Unpack.data.z) / 511.f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00454                 Result.w = clamp(float(Unpack.data.w) /   1.f, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00455                 return Result;
00456         }

00458         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint32 packUnorm3x10_1x2(vec4 const & v)
00459         {
00460                 detail::i10i10i10i2 Result;
00461                 Result.data.x = int(round(clamp(v.x, 0.0f, 1.0f) * 1023.f));
00462                 Result.data.y = int(round(clamp(v.y, 0.0f, 1.0f) * 1023.f));
00463                 Result.data.z = int(round(clamp(v.z, 0.0f, 1.0f) * 1023.f));
00464                 Result.data.w = int(round(clamp(v.w, 0.0f, 1.0f) *    3.f));
00465                 return Result.pack;
00466         }
00467 
00468         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vec4 unpackUnorm3x10_1x2(uint32 v)
00469         {
00470                 detail::i10i10i10i2 Unpack;
00471                 Unpack.pack = v;
00472                 vec4 Result;
00473                 Result.x = float(Unpack.data.x) / 1023.f;
00474                 Result.y = float(Unpack.data.y) / 1023.f;
00475                 Result.z = float(Unpack.data.z) / 1023.f;
00476                 Result.w = float(Unpack.data.w) /   3.f;
00477                 return Result;
00478         }

00480         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER uint32 packF2x11_1x10(vec3 const & v)
00481         {
00482                 return 
00483                         ((detail::floatTo11bit(v.x) & ((1 << 11) - 1)) <<  0) |
00484                         ((detail::floatTo11bit(v.y) & ((1 << 11) - 1)) << 11) |
00485                         ((detail::floatTo10bit(v.z) & ((1 << 10) - 1)) << 22);
00486         }
00487 
00488         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vec3 unpackF2x11_1x10(uint32 v)
00489         {
00490                 return vec3(
00491                         detail::packed11bitToFloat(v >> 0), 
00492                         detail::packed11bitToFloat(v >> 11), 
00493                         detail::packed10bitToFloat(v >> 22));
00494         }
